snippet.title: Heart Star iOS Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to the App Store on 9th of February!

Heart Star is an adorable puzzle platformer where you guide two little friends through two parallel worlds. Swap between the worlds to solve unique puzzles. Overcome all obstacles with the power of teamwork!

Follow me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AdventureIslandsGames/
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AdventIslands
